# About This Piece

Write details about the song here. You can include:
- Historical background
- Composer information
- Style and character notes
- Why you chose this piece

## Performance Notes

Tips for choir members:
- Tempo suggestions
- Difficult passages to watch for
- Interpretation guidance
- Dynamic markings

## Lyrics (optional)

Include the lyrics if helpful for reference.

---

## Important Notes:

### Optional Fields
- **arranger**: Delete this line if the composer and arranger are the same
- **excerpt**: Can be deleted if you don't want a preview description
- **tags**: Can be deleted or left empty
- **sheetMusic**: Delete the entire section if you have no sheet music yet
- **audio**: Delete the entire section if you have no audio files yet
- You can have as many or as few audio/sheet music items as you need

### Adding More Resources
To add more sheet music or audio files, copy and paste these lines:

For sheet music:
```
  - label: "Description of this file"
    url: "https://chicommunitychoir.lon1.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/sheet-music/filename.pdf"
```

For audio:
```
  - label: "Description of this file"
    url: "https://chicommunitychoir.lon1.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/audio/filename.mp3"
```

### Common Tags
- Style: classical, contemporary, folk, jazz, gospel, pop, rock
- Era: renaissance, baroque, romantic, modern
- Type: sacred, secular, a cappella, lullaby, carol, madrigal, hymn
- Language: english, latin, french, german, italian
